author: Jason Zweig
title: When Your Investing Robot Has a Mind of Its Own
text:
Not many people would keep adding money to a brand-new investment that has lost 9% in its first four months. But a robot will. That’s what has been happening at Wealthfront Inc., the automated online investment manager, or robo-adviser, that manages about $10.5 billion. In January, the firm launched Wealthfront Risk Parity, a mutual fund […]
